about_the_game:
Stone Age Colony Simulation

Establish your own settlement in the Stone Age and build a thriving colony!

Lead your settlers, explore new lands, gather resources, and construct buildings to create a safe, self-sustaining village. Your strategic choices will determine the survival and prosperity of the settlement, allowing your tribe to expand and gradually grow into a powerful colony.

Settlers with desire and will

Settlers eat when they're hungry, sleep when they're tired, and need treatment when they’re sick. They act according to their desires, but when you assign them jobs, they work diligently, learning the necessary skills and growing in their roles. As settlers develop, they begin to desire more comfortable homes and tastier food. If these desires aren’t met, their mood may worsen, sometimes leading to crime or even leaving the tribe. They are simple, but they trust you and believe that as long as they follow your guidance, there will always be food in the storage and a comfortable home where they can rest.

Managing Worlds with a Click

Efficiently manage your colony with simple clicks and drags. Command settlers as if they were units in a strategy game, and handle the colony's resources and buildings as easily as managing files and folders on an OS. Gather resources directly, move items, and perform necessary tasks seamlessly, even without the settlers' help. Manage your colony beyond the screen in the simplest and most efficient way.

Civilization Built Through Research

Settlers offer tributes to you, yearning for revelations of new knowledge.

Pass on wisdom through research and advance the settlement. Develop technologies for prosperity, from processing raw materials and farming to baking, as well as technologies for safety, such as defensive structures, iron weapons, and armor. Build essential structures and create a colony capable of adapting to stronger and more diverse environments. Through your wisdom, settlers will grow and achieve even more together with you.

Manage Settlers, Grow Colony

Effectively manage settlers to grow your colony.

Equip settlers with armor and weapons to turn them into soldiers to strengthen the colony’s defense, or provide them with tools to support efficient work. Additionally, reform barbarians through re-education to accept them as new settlers who follow you, or confine them to gain divine power. As time passes and your followers increase, address food shortages, crime, and social issues, guiding the settlement in the direction you desire.
